text: Aminu Ado Bayero (born 21 August 1961) is the 15th Fulani Emir of Kano from the Fulani Sullubawa clan. == Education == Bayero holds bachelor's degree in mass communication from Bayero University Kano and master's degree from Flying College, Oakland, California, US. He did his one-year mandatory National Youth Service Corps at the Nigeria Television Authority in Makurdi. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian people
title: Aminu Ado Bayero
